response.original_title: Fantastic Beasts: No Such Thing As A Fish Live
response.overview: A miscellany of fantastical animal theories through the ages, with a special guest (Sally Philips). Animals have always fascinated us, but studying the creatures of the earth is often fraught with fantasy, mistranslation and error. Join the self-proclaimed nerds of the No Such Thing As A Fish podcast, as they explore animal misunderstandings from the annals of natural history and beyond. A live version of the award-winning podcast from the QI offices, featuring the writers of the hit BBC show.
response.title: Fantastic Beasts: No Such Thing As A Fish Live
